name: 21TORR Interactive GmbH
description:
21TORR has been driving change since the word ‘digital’ was first coined. Based in Hamburg, Stuttgart, and Reutlingen, we are a team of strategists, brand builders, designers, and developers. 
We create experiences and implement solutions – invariably distinctive, forever different, always digital. For clients, of course, but preferably for and with people and organizations who share our passion for innovation.
